text: And he said unto me, If I had asked thee, saying, How many dwellings are there in the heart of the sea? or how many springs are there at the fountain head of the deep? or how many After the Oriental versions.  ways are above the firmament? or which are the outgoings So the Syriac. The Latin omits of hell? or which are the paths.  of hell? or which are the paths of paradise?
